channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiGate and FortiProxy
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiGate and FortiProxy

item.title: CVE-2020-6648|2024-08-04T09:11:04.625Z -- fortinet -- fortigate%20and%20fortiproxy
item.description: A cleartext storage of sensitive information vulnerability in FortiOS command line interface in versions 6.2.4 and earlier and FortiProxy 2.0.0, 1.2.9 and earlier may allow an authenticated attacker to obtain sensitive information such as users passwords by connecting to FortiGate CLI and executing the "diag sys ha checksum show" command.
